entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Calgary
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:22 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Calgary Int'l Airport 07:32 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: SE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries and periods of freezing rain ending near noon then cloudy. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
